Sentencas: In order to increase the coking resistance of SOFCs operating on DME fuel, a Pt/Al2O3Ni/MgO mixture catalyst was investigated for internal partial oxidation of DME.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: Catalytic test demonstrated the mixture catalyst has higher activity for DME partial oxidation and lower CH4 selectivity than the individual Pt/Al2O3 and Ni/MgO catalysts.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: O-2-TPO analysis demonstrated that the mixture catalyst also had much higher coke resistance than sintered Ni-YSZ anode, especially at high O-2 to DME ratio.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: Raman spectroscopy of the carbon-deposited catalysts demonstrates that the graphitization degree of carbon is reduced with introducing O-2 into DME, and the carbon deposited on the mixture catalyst is almost in amorphous structure.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: Two operation modes of the mixture catalyst for indirect internal partial oxidation of DME, i.e, directly depositing on the anode surface and locating in the anode chamber were tried.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: The performance of the cells operating on DME fuel through both operation modes was studied by I-V polarization test and EIS characterization.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: The cells delivered attractive peak power density of around 750 mW cm(-2) by operating on DME-O-2 mixture gas, modestly lower than 1012-1065 mW cm(-2) operating on pure hydrogen fuel at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst

Sentencas: The direct deposition of Pt/Al2O3 Ni/MgO onto anode surface to perform as a functional layer and a DME to O-2 ratio of 2:1 in the mixture gas is preferred to minimize coke formation and maximize power output for the cell to operate on DME fuel.
Titulo: Further performance enhancement of a DME-fueled solid oxide fuel cell by applying anode functional catalyst
